title: Device Posture Rules
description: Device posture rules configure security policies for device posture checks.

links.title: List Device Posture Rules
links.description: List Device Posture Rules for an account

links.title: Device Posture Rules Details
links.description: Fetch a single Device Posture Rule

links.title: Create Device Posture Rule
links.description: Create a new Device Posture Rule
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/devices/posture" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"file","name":"Admin Serial Numbers","description":"The rule for admin serial numbers","schedule":"1h","match":[{"platform":"windows"}],"input":{"id":"f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415"},"expiration":"1h"}'

type.description: The type of Device Posture Rule.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Rule.

description.description: The description of the Device Posture Rule

schedule.description: Tells the client when to run the device posture check.

match.description: The conditions that the client must match to run the rule.

input.description: The value to be checked against.

expiration.description: Expire posture results after the specified amount of time.

links.title: Update Device Posture Rule
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/devices/posture/f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"file","name":"Admin Serial Numbers","description":"The rule for admin serial numbers","schedule":"1h","match":[{"platform":"windows"}],"input":{"id":"f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415"},"expiration":"1h"}'

type.description: The type of Device Posture Rule.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Rule.

description.description: The description of the Device Posture Rule

schedule.description: Tells the client when to run the device posture check.

match.description: The conditions that the client must match to run the rule.

input.description: The value to be checked against.

expiration.description: Expire posture results after the specified amount of time.
